text: Site Allocations in the Central sub-area 2.1 Bow Common Lane 2.2 Chrisp Street Tower Hamlets Local Plan 417 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS BACK TO CONTENTS 2.1 Bow Common Lane Figure 32: 2.1 Bow Common Lane (indicative) 418 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS SITE ALLOCATIONSINTRODUCTION |Site information|Details| ||| |Relevant Permissions|PA/19/02379 – outline permission for comprehensive mixed-use development for residential, business uses including office and flexible workspace, retail, financial and professional services, food and drink uses, community, education and cultural uses, a sixth form centre, assembly and leisure uses, public open space. PA/22/00905/S – approval of reserved matters for blocks A, B, and C, including the construction of residential units, flexible residential facilities, and commercial uses, together with new public open space.|
